155.movie_plot: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

50.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

12.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
12.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

104.movie_plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

41.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)

2.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

141.movie_plot: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

92.movie_name: Treasure of the Sierra Madre, The (1948)
92.movie_plot: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

142.movie_plot: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

18.movie_plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

144.movie_plot: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

97.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
97.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

122.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)

73.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

28.movie_plot: A man visits his old friend's hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

44.movie_plot: Two counterculture bikers travel from Los Angeles to New Orleans in search of America.

154.movie_plot: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association of how women become different and immobilized robots.

55.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

0.movie_plot: A misogynistic and snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.

114.movie_plot: Lovers undo a hairdresser from Beverly Hills around Election Eve in 1968.

113.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

149.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

124.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

61.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

9.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

66.movie_plot: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

72.movie_plot: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

56.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

69.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

6.movie_plot: Wallace falls for Wendolene, a wool shop owner, while Gromit is framed for the sheep rustling.

52.movie_plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

151.movie_plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

16.movie_plot: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

138.movie_plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

14.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
14.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

11.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

90.movie_plot: Wallace takes a break from trying to decide on a holiday destination only to find he has no cheese for his crackers. The solution to both problems is a trip to the moon, with dog Gromit, because everybody knows the moon's made of cheese.

45.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

78.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

110.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

99.movie_plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

106.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

38.movie_plot: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

35.movie_plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

10.movie_plot: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

7.movie_plot: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

112.movie_plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

70.movie_plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

81.movie_plot: Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

85.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

77.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

62.movie_plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

23.movie_plot: Bonnie Parker, a bored waitress falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, robbing cars and banks.

161.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

102.movie_plot: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

103.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
103.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

76.movie_plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

115.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

105.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

36.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

101.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
101.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

164.movie_plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

147.movie_plot: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

83.movie_plot: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine - the Mob - track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

20.movie_plot: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

111.movie_plot: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

29.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

162.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

139.movie_plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

91.movie_plot: In an afterlife way station resembling a block of hotels, the lives of the recently-deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

119.movie_plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

135.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

131.movie_plot: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

84.movie_plot: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

87.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

153.movie_plot: Men seeking relief from the Black Death, guided by a boy's vision, dig a tunnel from 14th century England to 20th century New Zealand.

25.movie_plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during the First World War and then the October Revolution.

150.movie_plot: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

30.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
30.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

32.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

143.movie_plot: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of 30.

40.movie_plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

48.movie_plot: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to the mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

64.movie_plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

120.movie_plot: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

88.movie_plot: Wallace is used by a criminal penguin in a robbery involving mechanical trousers.

148.movie_plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

68.movie_plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

130.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

37.movie_plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

74.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

121.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
121.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

31.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

160.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

98.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

71.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

100.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
100.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

156.movie_plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

93.movie_plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

33.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

19.movie_plot: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

123.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
123.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

47.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

5.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

137.movie_plot: In 1950s England, professor Quatermass' manned rocket ship returns to Earth, but two of the astronauts are missing and the survivor seems ill and unable to communicate.

80.movie_plot: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

51.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

128.movie_plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

27.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
27.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

13.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

127.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

8.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
8.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

95.movie_plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

42.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.
